message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds significant value for us, and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its exceptional quality and features, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1500000. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and I'm willing to make a serious offer for it.
